name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】Amazing Swing ⧸ 3D新衣装お披露目＆重大告知あり！【 #角巻わため4周年 】 [W6hZ1EYa37g]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Tsunomaki Watame and Ceres Fauna performing 'Summertime' on a virtual stage themed like a bright city plaza.
Tsunomaki Watame stands alone on stage, greeting the audience and discussing the previous performances with her guests.
Tsunomaki Watame and AZKi perform 'Lilyby' in gothic-styled outfits on a purple and gold gears-themed stage.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 噂のドリーミンガール 忘れないで
subtitles.english: Don't forget the rumored dreaming girl

subtitles.original: でも気持ち伝えてしまえばいつか
subtitles.english: But if I convey my feelings, someday

subtitles.original: この夢は醒めてしまうだろうな
subtitles.english: this dream will surely come to an end.

subtitles.original: 青い影が揺れる街角
subtitles.english: On the street corner where blue shadows sway,

subtitles.original: Summertime
subtitles.english: Summertime

subtitles.original: やあ、みんな！
subtitles.english: Hi, everyone!

subtitles.original: ラムベガス Amazing Swing 楽しんでますかー！？
subtitles.english: Are you enjoying Lamb Vegas Amazing Swing!?

subtitles.original: いやあ、バカタレサーカスでね、新曲と
subtitles.english: Well, we had a new song with Bakatare Circus and...

subtitles.original: これはもう、アゲアゲな曲を最初にね、ちょっとぶっ放したかったので
subtitles.english: I really wanted to start off with some high-energy songs,

subtitles.original: その選曲にさせていただいて、で、ぼたんちゃんとはメランコリック！
subtitles.english: so I chose that setlist. And with Botan-chan, it was 'Melancholic'!

subtitles.original: なんか甘酸っぱい、え、好きなの？ どうなくっついちゃうの？ え、どうなの？
subtitles.english: It's a bittersweet one, like 'Do you like me? Are we getting close? What's going on?'

subtitles.original: みたいな感じのね、甘酸っぱい曲を一緒に歌って踊らせていただきました！
subtitles.english: We sang and danced to a bittersweet song like that together!

subtitles.original: そしてなんと、ファウナとも！
subtitles.english: And then, I performed with Fauna too!

subtitles.original: え、初めてわための記念配信で3Dでね、一緒に歌って踊って
subtitles.english: It was our first time singing and dancing together in 3D on my anniversary stream.

subtitles.original: Summertime。ちょっとわためが、あの、男の子のね、パートをやらせていただいて
subtitles.english: Performing 'Summertime', I took on the boy's part,

subtitles.original: で、ファウナちゃんが女の子のパートをね、歌って踊っていただいて
subtitles.english: and Fauna-chan sang and danced the girl's part.

subtitles.original: どうだったかな？ どうだったかな？
subtitles.english: How was it? How was it?

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、やってみたかったんだよね。全部、楽しんでもらえてたら...
subtitles.english: I've always wanted to try that. If you enjoyed it all...

subtitles.original: 楽しい？ 楽しい？
subtitles.english: Are you having fun? Are you?

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ 楽しい。圧じゃない、圧じゃないからね！
subtitles.english: Thank you! 'Fun'. I'm not pressuring you, okay!?

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。でもまだまだ終わらない！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much. But it's not over yet!

subtitles.original: ここからゲストパート後半戦です！
subtitles.english: Now for the second half of the guest segments!

subtitles.original: うーん、楽しんでいこう！
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's keep having fun!

subtitles.original: リルビ 作詞・作曲：てにをは
subtitles.english: Lilyby - Lyrics & Composition: teniwoha

subtitles.original: ねえドクター、ヘッドクター メンテしておドクター
subtitles.english: Hey Doctor, Head Doctor, please maintain me, Doctor

subtitles.original: またいつもの例のバグが
subtitles.english: That usual bug is back again

subtitles.original: ハッピー、アラッキー、息々するもっと
subtitles.english: Happy, unlucky, breathing more and more

subtitles.original: 組み立て全マイ、式の心、どこだ？
subtitles.english: Assembled clockwork, where is the heart of the ceremony?

subtitles.original: おかしいね、おかしいね、崩れないね イェイイェイ
subtitles.english: It's strange, isn't it? It doesn't break, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: わけないね、わけないね、ハイスペックなんで
subtitles.english: It's easy, it's easy, because I'm high-spec

subtitles.original: 三千の保、やらなきゃさ
subtitles.english: Three thousand maintenance tasks, I have to do them

subtitles.original: ドキドキが止まりそう、ネジ巻いて
subtitles.english: My heartbeat is about to stop, wind up the spring

subtitles.original: なんていうか、エブリデイ ねじ巻いて ねじ巻いてよ
subtitles.english: How should I put it, wind it up every day, wind it up

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね、ちょっちょちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little bit, just-just-just a little bit

subtitles.original: ピーポパポ鳴らして 夢を作る
subtitles.english: Beep-bo-ba-po, making a dream

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね、ちょっちょちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little bit, just-just-just a little bit

subtitles.original: いまはまだ、止まっちゃいそう、そのうち
subtitles.english: Right now, it feels like it's going to stop soon

subtitles.original: なくなっちゃうかも、リルビ リルビ もっと
subtitles.english: I might lose it, Lilyby Lilyby more

subtitles.original: ねえドクター、メンテしたのドクター？
subtitles.english: Hey Doctor, did you maintain me, Doctor?

subtitles.original: Lalala...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: 自給の呪いなんて 払お
subtitles.english: Let's cast away the curse of self-subsistence

subtitles.original: なんだか、おっかないね、おっかないね、とんでもないね イェイイェイ
subtitles.english: Somehow, it's scary, isn't it? It's incredible, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: これはもう、テクノだ テクノロジーだ
subtitles.english: This is already techno, it's technology

subtitles.original: 三連速だって 持ってるの
subtitles.english: I even have triple speed

subtitles.original: わかったらその手で すぐ巻いて
subtitles.english: If you understand, wind it up with those hands right away

subtitles.original: よわくても まだまだね ねじ巻いて ねじ巻いてよ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm weak, I'm not done yet, wind it up, wind it up

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね、ちょっちょちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little bit, just-just-just a little bit

subtitles.original: きみが、ミスっても笑わせてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll make you laugh even if you make a mistake

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけね、ちょっちょちょっとだけね
subtitles.english: Just a little bit, just-just-just a little bit

subtitles.original: ほら、ドコドコドコドコ アップデートして
subtitles.english: Look, update it everywhere

subtitles.original: でもありがとう 心から リルビ リルビ
subtitles.english: But thank you from the bottom of my heart, Lilyby Lilyby

subtitles.english: Before that, for now, wind it up
